Spoof horror, satirising Signs, The Ring, The Others and 8 Mile, starring Anna Faris, Pamela Anderson, Charlie Sheen, Leslie Nielsen and Queen Latifah(n).(n)

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: A father tries to resurrect his dead son by placing him in an enchanted burial ground but the plan backfires with devastating results. Horror, starring Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne and Denise Crosby, with a cameo appearance by author Stephen King, whose book provided the basis for the film(n).(n)

programme.title: Honeytrap
programme.desc: A Brixton teenager's misguided attempts to attract the attention of a heartless wannabe rapper have terrible results. Drama, starring Jessica Sula, Lucien Laviscount and Ntonga Mwanza(n).

programme.title: (GMT) Tokyo Tribe (2014)
programme.desc: In an alternative, dystopian Tokyo, rival street gangs must join forces to defeat their common enemy, a cannibalistic gangster. Japanese sci-fi drama based on a popular Manga series, starring Ryohei Suzuki, Riki Takeuchi and Akihiro Kitamura(n).

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
programme.desc: A shy, naive lawyer falls foul of a gunslinger while on his way to the backwoods town of Shinbone. His life is saved by a local woman, and he in turn devotes himself to helping the townsfolk while searching for a way to bring the bandit to justice. However, he finally comes to realise that a more aggressive approach will be needed. John Ford's Western, starring James Stewart, Lee Marvin, John Wayne, Woody Strode and Vera Miles(n).

programme.title: (GMT) The Bridge on the River Kwai (1957)
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins(n).

programme.title: White Bird in a Blizzard
programme.desc: A teenager relishes her newfound freedom when her mother goes missing, seizing the opportunity to flirt with the boy next door and a cop on the case. Over time, she begins to realise what she has lost and finds the unexplained details of the disappearance haunting her. Mystery based on Laura Kasischke's novel, starring Shailene Woodley and Eva Green(n).

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch(n).

programme.title: For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: An enigmatic gunslinger forms an uneasy alliance with a military veteran to track down a notorious outlaw - but tensions simmer as their very different motives for the hunt put them increasingly at odds. Sergio Leone's Western sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef, Gian Maria Volonte, Josef Egger, Mara Krup and Klaus Kinski(n).

programme.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
programme.desc: A laconic gunslinger, a ruthless hired killer and a conniving outlaw hunt for a cache of loot during the chaos of the American Civil War. However, each is privy to only part of the information necessary to find it, setting in motion a series of deadly betrayals. The third film in Sergio Leone's Spaghetti Western trilogy, starring Clint Eastwood as the Man with No Name, with Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach. With a soundtrack by Ennio Morricone(n).

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Gay rights activists gather in London for a pride march in 1984, and decide they have a common cause with the miners' strike. When their fundraising activities are rejected by the miners' union, they travel to a Welsh pit village to show their support in person. Fact-based drama, starring Ben Schnetzer, Bill Nighy, Andrew Scott and Imelda Staunton(n).

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton(n).

programme.title: Out of Sight
programme.desc: A charming bank robber breaks out of jail and takes a female US Marshal hostage. Managing to escape, she sets out to track him down as he prepares for one last job - but as the chase intensifies, so do their feelings for each other. Steven Soderbergh's romantic crime drama, based on Elmore Leonard's novel, with George Clooney, Jennifer Lopez, Ving Rhames and Don Cheadle(n).

programme.title: The Survivalist
programme.desc: A loner survives the downfall of civilisation, living in a remote cabin on a small plot of land. When two women discover his refuge, he grudgingly allows them food and shelter, but they struggle to trust one another, especially as the supplies begin to run out. Thriller, starring Martin McCann and Mia Goth(n).(n)

programme.title: Partisan
programme.desc: A young boy raised to be an assassin starts to question the ways of his community's charismatic and domineering leader. Drama, with Vincent Cassel, Jeremy Chabriel and Florence Mezzara(n).(n)

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins(n).(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman(n).(n)

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: A 17th-century English settler in America falls in love with a native princess, but as conflict erupts between their people he is forced to abandon her. She is converted to Christianity, adopting European culture and forming a romance with a tobacco planter, but remains torn between two worlds. Terrence Malick's epic historical drama, starring Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christian Bale and Christopher Plummer(n).(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner(n).(n)

programme.title: The Machinist
programme.desc: A factory worker suffering from chronic insomnia has not slept properly in more than a year. When his extreme fatigue results in a tragic accident, his colleagues turn on him and he sinks into a state of intense paranoia, becoming obsessed with a man nobody else believes exists. Psychological thriller, starring Christian Bale, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Michael Ironside(n).(n)

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor
programme.desc: A bookish CIA researcher returns to his field office to find all his colleagues have been murdered in his absence. When he tries to uncover the truth, he also ends up targeted for assassination by his own agency, and is forced to go on the run to discover the reasons why. Sydney Pollack's thriller, starring Robert Redford, Faye Dunaway, Cliff Robertson and Max von Sydow(n).(n)

programme.title: The Burning
programme.desc: A mysterious man attempts to rescue a young woman who has been kidnapped by the mercenaries who murdered her father and took control of his farm. Argentinean Western drama, starring Gael Garcia Bernal, Alice Braga and Claudio Tolcachir(n).(n)

programme.title: The Salvation
programme.desc: A Danish settler in the Wild West is joined by his wife and son, but they are soon murdered. He avenges their deaths, but his actions attract the wrath of a ruthless gang leader. Abandoned by his friends and neighbours, the peaceful pioneer is forced to stand alone to enforce the law in his new home. Western, starring Mads Mikkelsen and Eva Green(n).(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey(n).(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: A Navy Seal becomes a legend to his colleagues thanks to his skills as a deadly sniper, but he finds living an ordinary life as a husband and father difficult to deal with. Biopic based on the experiences of real-life Iraq conflict veteran Chris Kyle, directed by Clint Eastwood and starring Bradley Cooper, Sienna Miller and Kyle Gallner(n).(n)

programme.title: Eyes Without a Face
programme.desc: A surgeon is guilt-ridden when his daughter is left disfigured after an accident he caused and works tirelessly to give the girl a new face, but he turns to crime in the process. Georges Franju's surreal horror, starring Pierre Brasseur, Alida Valli and Edith Scob. In French(n).

programme.title: (GMT) Rec 3: Genesis (2012)
programme.desc: A couple's wedding day takes a grim turn when some of the guests display signs of a strange illness. They are soon falling prey to a disease that turns people into bloodthirsty maniacs. In the ensuing carnage, the bride and groom are separated and face a desperate struggle to find each other. Horror sequel, starring Leticia Dolera and Diego Martin. In Spanish and Catalan(n).

programme.title: (GMT) Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Rodrick Rules (2011)
programme.desc: A hapless youngster faces the daunting prospect of starting a new school year and desperately tries to impress a girl in his class. But as if that weren't enough to contend with, his parents also force him to spend more time with his bullying older brother. Children's comedy sequel, starring Zachary Gordon and Devon Bostick(n).

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A casino magnate approaches a group of no-hopers with the offer of $2million to whoever retrieves the sum from a locker in a train station in New Mexico, prompting a madcap cross-continent dash. Meanwhile, the casino owner's high-rolling gambler friends place bets on which of the bumbling contestants will win. Comedy, with Rowan Atkinson, John Cleese, Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Bates, Seth Green and Cuba Gooding Jr(n).

programme.title: Master of the World
programme.desc: A Victorian hot air balloon expedition is captured by the captain of a hi-tech airship who intends to use his craft to bring about world peace by destroying military installations across the world. Sci-fi adventure based on Jules Verne's novels, starring Vincent Price and Charles Bronson, with Henry Hull and Mary Webster(n).

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: A party of explorers studying the sunken remains of the famous liner meets an elderly woman who was a passenger on the ill-fated maiden voyage. She recounts how she boarded the ship while on the brink of being forced into marriage by her family, and was stopped from killing herself by a penniless artist. She fell in love with her saviour, but the disaster on the horizon meant their time together was doomed to be short. James Cameron's Oscar-winning romantic drama, starring Kate Winslet, Leonardo DiCaprio, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates and Bill Paxton(n).

programme.title: GI Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: An elite military team is nearly wiped out after a terrorist organisation replaces the US president with an imposter and has them declared enemies of the state. The handful of survivors seek the help of their original leader in avenging their fallen comrades. Action adventure sequel, starring Dwayne Johnson, Ray Park and Bruce Willis(n).

programme.title: 100 Bloody Acres
programme.desc: Premiere. Two brothers' organic fertiliser business is booming thanks to their product's extra-special ingredient of human blood, with their next supply arriving in the form of three people whose vehicle has broken down while they were on their way to a music festival. Australian comedy horror, starring Angus Sampson, Damon Herriman and Anna McGahan(n).

programme.title: FilmFear: Fright Bites
programme.desc: Horror short, directed by Jed Hart and starring Arthur Tucker and Saskia Roddick(n).(n)

programme.title: FilmFear: Fright Bites
programme.desc: Horror short, directed by Lucy Campbell and starring Lotte Spencer and Rafaella Hutchinson(n).(n)

programme.title: Kill List
programme.desc: A hitman with money worries is persuaded by his old partner to take on one last job. The duo's mysterious client presents them with a list of three targets, but as they go about their deadly work, they start to realise there is something far more disturbing going on than a simple act of murder. Thriller, with Neil Maskell, Michael Smiley and Myanna Buring(n).(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: A plane crashes in the blazing heat of the desert - and as time passes, the crew and passengers realise their only chance of making it through the ordeal alive is to repair the badly damaged craft. Adventure, starring James Stewart, Richard Attenborough, Peter Finch and Ernest Borgnine(n).(n)

programme.title: The Cowboys
programme.desc: An ageing rancher finds himself short-handed when his workers abandon him during a gold rush, and grudgingly hires a group of schoolboys to help him on a 400-mile cattle drive. Although at first they feel out of their depth, the youngsters quickly learn to work like men - but face a dangerous challenge ahead as a gang of rustlers begins to stalk them. Western, with John Wayne, Roscoe Lee Browne and Bruce Dern(n).(n)

programme.title: Bell, Book and Candle
programme.desc: An alluring witch casts a spell on the handsome publisher who lives upstairs in her Manhattan apartment block to stop him marrying her old college rival. Meanwhile, her beatnik warlock brother is trying to write a novel in collaboration with a drunken novelist. Supernatural romantic comedy, starring James Stewart, Kim Novak, Jack Lemmon, Ernie Kovacs and Elsa Lanchester(n).(n)

programme.title: Hocus Pocus
programme.desc: A teenager in Salem, Massachusetts, breaks into a spooky house on Halloween and accidentally resurrects three witches who have been dead for 300 years. The sorceresses are soon causing chaos while seeking a suitable sacrifice for a ritual to give them eternal youth. However, an old foe - a boy they turned into a cat - is on hand to help stop their mischief. Supernatural Disney comedy, with Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy and Omri Katz(n).(n)

programme.title: Devil's Due
programme.desc: Premiere. A newlywed couple are surprised to discover they are expecting their first child soon after their honeymoon. The husband decides to document his wife's pregnancy on film, but witnesses her undergoing a strange transformation that leaves him wondering if there is something supernatural about the unborn baby. Horror, starring Allison Miller and Zach Gilford(n).(n)

programme.title: Fright Night
programme.desc: A teenager becomes convinced his new next door neighbour is a vampire responsible for a series of recent disappearances. Finding nobody is willing to believe his unlikely story, he seeks the aid of a washed-up movie star famous for playing a vampire hunter in destroying the monster. Comedy horror, starring Chris Sarandon, Roddy McDowall, William Ragsdale, Amanda Bearse and Stephen Geoffreys(n).(n)

programme.title: Christmas on Division Street
programme.desc: An upper-class youngster befriends an eccentric 80-year-old vagrant, who takes him on a journey into an America he never knew existed, where poverty, degradation and despair are commonplace. Drama, with Fred Savage, Hume Cronyn, Jim Byrnes, Kenneth Welsh and Badja Djola(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Grandma is admitted to hospital, but Grandpa does not cope well with being away from her. Corabeth thinks Elizabeth is a bad influence on Aimee, and forbids them from being friends(n).

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The Baldwin sisters' niece returns to America after living in Germany, and John Boy suspects she is running away from something terrible that happened there(n).

programme.title: William, Kate and George: The New Royal Family
programme.desc: With insightful expert commentary and exclusive footage, the documentary explores the development of a modern royal family in touch and relevant to its nation and people(n).

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Days of Sunshine, Days of Shadow - Part Three.
programme.desc: Part three of three. A tornado hits the Wilder home leaving Laura injured. To make matters worse, once the tornado is over the Wilder home is just a pile of rubble(n).

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mr Edwards arrives back at Walnut Grove harbouring some disturbing secrets, namely the destruction of his marriage to alcoholism. His friendship with Charles is also affected(n).

programme.title: The Christmas Shoes
programme.desc: A little boy is determined to do whatever he can to buy his dying mother a pair of expensive red shoes. Along the way, his tireless efforts inspire an amazing transformation in the life of a cold-hearted lawyer struggling to cope with the slow disintegration of his marriage. Festive family drama, starring Rob Lowe, Maria Del Mar, Max Morrow and Kimberly Williams(n).

programme.title: (GMT) A Dream for Christmas (1973)
programme.desc: An Arkansas minister moves his family across America when he is placed in charge of a Los Angeles church, only to find the congregation is small and the building threatened with demolition. The clergyman is determined to make a success of his new posting, and as Christmas approaches, something miraculous occurs. Drama, starring Hari Rhodes and Beah Richards(n).

programme.title: Must Be Santa
programme.desc: Father Christmas plans to retire after a lifetime of sterling service, but his replacement proves to be something of a surprise and has a hard time living up to his predecessor's expectations. Festive comedy, starring Dabney Coleman, Deanna Milligan and Arnold Pinnock(n).

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance(n).

programme.title: The Case for Christmas
programme.desc: A greedy business mogul is still bitter about not receiving the presents he wanted as a child, so decides to sue Santa Claus. Needing legal representation, the jolly old man turns to a lawyer desperately trying to balance his career and his responsibilities as a father. Festive comedy, starring Dean Cain, Rachel Blanchard and George Buza(n).

programme.title: A Christmas Romance
programme.desc: A selfish banker visits a single mother with the intention of repossessing her house, but his plans go awry as a snowstorm forces him to stay there and romance begins to blossom. Family drama, starring Olivia Newton-John and Gregory Harrison(n).

programme.title: A Holiday to Remember
programme.desc: A single mum returns to her childhood home where she intends to escape from the pressures of life in Los Angeles - until an old boyfriend persuades her to rekindle the flames of their passion. Romantic drama, with Connie Sellecca, Randy Travis, Asia Vieria and Rue McClanahan(n).

programme.title: One Christmas
programme.desc: A boy is sent to spend Christmas with the alcoholic father he has never met and finds that the festive season helps bring them together. Drama, starring Katharine Hepburn and Henry Winkler(n).

programme.title: A Dream for Christmas
programme.desc: An Arkansas minister moves his family across America when he is placed in charge of a Los Angeles church, only to find the congregation is small and the building threatened with demolition. The clergyman is determined to make a success of his new posting, and as Christmas approaches, something miraculous occurs. Drama, starring Hari Rhodes and Beah Richards(n).

programme.title: Christmas in Canaan
programme.desc: Two boys, one black and the other white, grow up in a racially divided Texas community in the 1960s. The pair take an instant dislike to each other, but their families are determined to end the conflict by forcing them to spend time together. The youngsters grow to become firm friends, but the tension among their neighbours is harder to resolve. Drama, with Jaishon Fisher and Zak Ludwig(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy needs some peace and quiet to finish writing his book. Ben quits his job at the newspaper and becomes a car salesman, but picks up some dishonest habits(n).(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John -Boy has heard nothing from the publisher whom he sent his book, so goes to new York to find out if it is going to be printed(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: After a plea from an old friend, Caroline Ingalls brings help to a disease-ridden gold-mining camp where she is forced to make an agonising decision about a newborn baby(n).(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: He Was Only Twelve - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of three. James walks into a bank in the middle of a robbery and gets caught in the crossfire(n).(n)

programme.title: Christmas Lilies of the Field
programme.desc: A soldier completes his tour of duty, and decides to visit a group of nuns whom he one built a chapel for. He finds himself still inspired by their devotion to helping others, and puts his skills at their disposal once again, this time building an orphanage and a school. Drama sequel, starring Billy Dee Williams and Maria Schell(n).(n)

programme.title: On the Second Day of Christmas

Drama, starring Rebecca De Mornay, Henry Czerny, Barclay Hope and Lila Yee(n).(n)

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: Teenage Cady Heron was educated in Africa by her scientist parents. When her family moves to the suburbs of Illinois, Cady finally gets to experience public school and gets a quick primer on the cruel, tacit laws of popularity that divide her fellow students into tightly knit cliques. She unwittingly finds herself in the good graces of an elite group of cool students dubbed ''the Plastics,'' but Cady soon realizes how her shallow group of new friends earned this nickname(n).

programme.desc: When a demon takes possession of her, high-school hottie Jennifer turns a hungry eye on guys who never stood a chance with her before. programme.title: Dawn of the Dead

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Buddy was accidentally transported to the North Pole as a toddler and raised to adulthood among Santa's elves. Unable to shake the feeling that he doesn't fit in, the adult Buddy travels to New York, in full elf uniform, in search of his real father. As it happens, this is Walter Hobbs, a cynical businessman. After a DNA test proves this, Walter reluctantly attempts to start a relationship with the childlike Buddy with increasingly chaotic results(n).(c)

programme.title: The Girl Next Door
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old Matthew Kidman is a straight-arrow overachiever who has never really lived life... until he falls for his new neighbor, the beautiful and seemingly innocent Danielle . When Matthew discovers this perfect girl next door is a one-time porn star, his sheltered existence begins to spin out of control. Ultimately, Danielle helps Matthew emerge from his shell and discover that sometimes you have to risk everything for the person you love(n).

programme.desc: This sequel focuses on ex-police officer Brian O'Conner, who relocates from Los Angeles to Miami to start over. programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Podczas bankietu stróżów prawa Jane odbiera nagrodę za wzorową współpracę z policją. Nagle uroczystość przerywa Hope Prentiss, która zarzuca Bingum, że zniszczyła jej małżeństwo, romansując z jej mężem. Oskarżenia są poważne, ale Jane jest przekonana, że to nieporozumienie. Co prawda nie pamięta nic ze swojej przeszłości, ale nie wierzy, by mogła związać się z żonatym mężczyzną. Hope pokazuje jednak zdjęcia jednoznacznie dowodzące, że Bingum spotykała się z Toddem Prentissem w motelu. Co więcej, ten policjant zniknął bez śladu osiem miesięcy temu, wkrótce po rzekomej randce z Jane. By rozwiązać tę zagadkę, Bingum musi lepiej poznaą swoją przeszłość. Tymczasem Grayson staje do sądowej batalii z byłym narzeczonym swojej obecnej dziewczyny Vanessy, Willem Caseyem. Musi przekonać go, by nie przenosił on fabryki do Meksyku, wskutek czego wszyscy amerykańscy pracownicy jego firmy stracą pracę. Dla Kenta to bardzo ważna sprawa, także ze względów osobistych(n).(n)

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Parker zleca Kim obronę A.J. Fowlera, producenta popularnego reality show "Ta jedyna". Formuła programu zakłada, że kawaler wybiera narzeczoną spośród 30 kandydatek. Wendy Simon odpadła w finale, a teraz oskarża Fowlera o spowodowanie cierpień emocjonalnych. Kim i Parker krok po kroku odkrywają tajemnice tego show i trafiają na trop prawdziwej historii miłosnej, która wydarzyła się na jego planie. Tymczasem Grayson i Jane reprezentują Evana Robbinsa, który został zwolniony z pracy z bardzo oryginalnego powodu. Po śmierci żony zaczął bowiem przeobrażać się w klauna, mimo że nie był zatrudniony w cyrku. Przychodził do pracy w kostiumie i w pełnym makijażu. W ten sposób odreagowywał stratę ukochanej. Jego współpracownicy nie potrafili zrozumieć zachowania kolegi i złożyli przeciwko niemu pozew zbiorowy(n).(n)

programme.title: Whoops I Missed the Bus
programme.desc: Join vloggers Laura, Tee Cee and Myles as they bring you up to speed on all the drama, fun and giggles in the world of CBBC. Catch up on brand new The Next Step, get the inside scoop on Eve, and find out what Laura thought of Rank The Prank. Plus watch your favourite CBBC presenters as they attempt their best celeb impressions. Might be cool, might be cringe - catch the bus to find out which!(n).

programme.title: Rank the Prank
programme.desc: Rank the Prank - pranking Hollywood style! Today our pesky pranksters are Prank 360 (Zhara and Sara) and Gladiators (Hadrian and Luke) who team up with SFX specialists Marc Reichel and Andy Antoine and stunt performer Devon Slack to stage the biggest and best PUBLIC PRANKS on an unsuspecting public. Today teams invade an office building and for unsuspecting targets, it's going to be anything but another... day at the office! It's all hands on deck to rig the hidden cameras and special effects required to bring our Pranksters' ideas to life. But which team will impress our prank-loving panel of 'Ranksters' to win the chance to stage a mind blowing MEGA PRANK on a 'target' of their choice? It's a battle between the head-scratching 'Office Switcheroo' and the super-charged 'Trainwreck Hallway'! Ranksters ... the choice is yours. For the winning team, Marc, Andy and Devon have planned a MEGA PRANK packed with ninja power! The setting is a martial arts dojo, complete with flying rigs, flying crates and flying people! Will the targets flap their wings and take flight too? One thing's for sure, this MEGA PRANK is gonna be fly!(n).

Needing no excuse to blow things up, they put the genius of dynamite to the test, visit the world's largest boring drill burrowing its way through The Alps, before building their own epic tunnelling robot!(n).

programme.title: The Dumping Ground

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Eve's attempts to help her sister KT pass for human are derailed when a miraculously recovered Katherine returns to Calimov. To Nick and Eve's horror, Katherine reveals her new range of childbots, which have been placed with local families. To prevent Katherine restoring KT to factory settings, Eve smuggles her out of Calimov and back to the Clarke house. But with Will and Lily insisting KT is returned to Calimov, Eve and her sister are forced to take matters into their own hands. The situation escalates when Katherine's childbots start to malfunction and it is KT who comes under suspicion, admitting she has no wish to pass as human. In order to make Eve prove she loves her sister as she is, KT wants Eve to reveal her own robot identity to the world. Trapped inside the house by the childbots, and with police and reporters gathering outside, the gang's worst fears have been realised. With Eve about to admit her secret to the world on live TV, can Will's nanobots save the day?(n).

programme.title: Naomi's Nightmares of Nature

programme.title: Show Me What You're Made Of
programme.desc: Stacey Dooley presents as the five kids return to the south of England for a taste of some of the shift work done at night by thousands of people across the country. The kids are taken aback to discover that they are joining the cleaning team at a big bus garage in south London. It's hard physical work, and the shift goes on long into the night, requiring them to sweep, mop and wash each double-decker bus by hand.
